home.name: Maksym Atamanchuk
home.title: Frontend Developer
home.description: I am frontend developer who loves creation interaction, scalable web applications. My purpose is to build solutions that offer dynamic UI, high performance and delightful UX.

about.title: Crafting Digital Experiences
about.paragraph1: I build modern, responsive web applications with a focus on performance, usability, and maintainability. Using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind, I create interactive interfaces and seamless user experiences that work flawlessly across devices.
about.paragraph2: I specialize in component-driven architecture, efficient state management, and API integration, crafting scalable solutions that grow with your needs. From dynamic dashboards and sliders to custom calculators and complex web services, I turn ideas into production-ready applications that are both functional and visually polished.
about.paragraph3: My goal is to combine clean code with thoughtful design, delivering applications that users love and businesses rely on.
about.quote: My purpose is to build solutions that offer dynamic UI, high performance and delightful UX.

service1.title: Interactive Frontend Development
service1.description: Focus on React, TypeScript, and Tailwind, I specialize in crafting interactive frontend applications with smooth animations and micro-interactions that bring your digital experiences to life with engaging, responsive interfaces.

service2.title: Performance Optimization
service2.description: Code splitting, lazy loading, and performance auditing for faster load times. Delivering lightning-fast experiences that keep users engaged and improve conversion rates.

service3.title: Scalable Architecture
service3.description: Component systems and maintainable codebases for growing applications. Building solid foundations that evolve with your business needs and support long-term growth.
